i1.name: Mark of the Kindred
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Both '''Lamb''' and '''Wolf''' mark targets to ''hunt''. Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} on a marked target permanently empowers '''Kindred's''' abilities, as well as granting '''Lamb''' {{passive progression/deprecated version|type=Marks|8|75|100|125|150|175|200|225|250|4|7|10|13|16|19|22|25|formula=+75 at 4 Marks, and +25 every 3 Marks thereafter, up to 250 bonus range at 25 Marks.}} {{sti|range|'''bonus''' range}} on her basic attacks and {{ai|Mounting Dread|Kindred}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Lamb:}} '''Lamb''' is offered a selection of enemy {{tip|champions}} to take down, which is hidden while {{tt|in combat with an enemy champion|6 seconds timer}}. Once selected, there's an 8 second delay before the ''Mark'' can be collected, and '''Lamb''' can change her target if the target hasn't died during a period of time. ''Targets successfully hunted cannot be targeted again for 4 minutes.''

q1.name: Dance of Arrows
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lamb''' {{tip|dashes}} toward the target location, gaining {{sti|attack speed|{{as|25%|attack speed}}}} {{as|(+ 5% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} for 4 seconds and firing up to three arrows to nearby {{tip|sight|visible}} targets after dashing, each one dealing {{as|physical damage}}. '''Lamb's''' current attack target at any proximity will be prioritized by one of the arrows.
Casting {{ai|Wolf's Frenzy|Kindred}} or using ''Dance of Arrows'' while inside its area will reduce this ability's {{sti|cooldown}} to an amount.
'''Lamb''' can cast any of her [[champion ability|abilities]] during ''Dance of Arrows' '' dash.
''Dance of Arrows'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Lamb's''' basic attack timer.
q1.notes:
* The dash does not have a fixed range, it can be directed by up to 340 units.
* The dash distance can be extended to up to 400 units when dashing across terrain.
* The cooldown will not be modified if it cannot be reduced (the current cooldown would have to be less than the reduction amount in this case).

w1.name: Wolf's Frenzy
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} As '''Kindred''' move and attack, they build up to 100 stacks of ''Hunter's Vigor''. At full stacks, '''Lamb's''' next basic attack {{tip|heals}} her for up to {{passive progression/deprecated version|49 to 100}}, based on {{as|'''Kindred's''' '''missing''' health}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Wolf''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target location and claims the surrounding area as his territory for the next {{fd|8.5}} seconds, separating from '''Lamb'''. '''Wolf''' [[Champion summoned units|autonomously]] attacks enemies within the area, prioritizing '''Lamb's''' attack target.

'''Wolf's''' basic attacks deal {{as|magic damage}} and scale with {{as|25% of '''Kindred's bonus''' attack speed}}. Against [[monster]]s, '''Wolf''' deals 50% increased damage and his attacks {{tip|slow}} the target by 50% for 2 seconds.
''Wolf's Frenzy'' ends immediately if '''Lamb''' leaves the area or dies.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|25 to 45}} {{as|(+ 20% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}}% {{as|(+ 1% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} of target's '''current''' health)}}}}
w1.notes:
* '''Wolf''' is {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|ghosted}} but he cannot move through terrain other than the initial dash on activation. 
* '''Wolf''' is not able to re-target {{ui|Rift Scuttler}} if he loses {{tip|sight}} of her while he's attacking it.
* ''Wolf's Frenzy'' does not end if '''Lamb''' enters {{tip|resurrection}}.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|25 to 45}} {{as|(+ 20% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|1.5}}% {{as|(+ 1% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} of target's '''current''' health)}}}}
effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 20% bonus AD) (+ 1.5% (+ 1% per Mark) of target's current health)

st_slices: (+ 20% '''bonus''' AD) (+ 1.5% (+ 1% per Mark) of target's '''current''' health)

title: Magic Damage
(+ 20% '''bonus''' AD) (+ 1.5% (+ 1% per Mark) of target's '''current''' health)

e1.name: Mounting Dread
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lamb''' applies a mark to the target enemy for 4 seconds and cripples them, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 50% for 1 second.

'''Lamb's''' attacks against the target refreshes the mark's duration. If she manages to [[basic attack]] the marked target twice, her third attack directs '''Wolf''' to pounce them, consuming the mark to deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, capped at 300 against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.

'''Wolf's''' pounce will {{tip|critically strike}} for {{as|{{critical damage|50|150}}|physical damage}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} against targets below {{as|{{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|11|type=critical strike chance|key=%|key1=%|15 to 15+100/2|0 to 100|displayformula=15% (+ 0.5% per 1% critical strike chance). ''This is capped at 100% critical strike chance.''}}|health}} of their {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}}.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|80 to 160}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 8% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5}}% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
e1.notes: * The '''bonus''' damage will not benefit from {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} unless the target is below the '''maximum''' health condition.
e1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  50 as 50 and riot's value 0,0,0,0,0 as 0

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|80 to 160}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 8% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.5}}% per {{ai|Mark of the Kindred|Kindred|Mark}})|buzzword}} of target's '''missing''' health)}}}}
effects.str: • Bonus Physical Damage: (+ 80% bonus AD) (+ 8% (+ 0.5% per Mark) of target's missing health)

st_slices: (+ 80% '''bonus''' AD) (+ 8% (+ 0.5% per Mark) of target's '''missing''' health)

title: Bonus Physical Damage
(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD) (+ 8% (+ 0.5% per Mark) of target's '''missing''' health)

r1.name: Lamb's Respite
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lamb''' blesses the ground under herself for 4 seconds and enters a {{rutngt|0.25}} [[Channel#Casting Times|cast time]]. '''All''' units inside the zone cannot be [[Death#Ways_to_prevent_dying_by_not_losing_health|reduced]] below {{as|{{sti|health|10% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}, and will become {{tip|invulnerable}} for the remaining duration when they reach or are at the threshold, during which they also cannot be {{tip|heal|healed}}, but can still {{sti|health regeneration|regenerate health|link=health regeneration}}.
All targetable units within the zone are {{tip|heal|healed}} immediately when the blessing ends.
r1.notes:
* ''Lamb's Respite'' will affect all {{tip|champions}}, {{tip|minions}}, and {{tip|monsters}}, but not {{tip|ward|wards}}, {{tip|turret|turrets}}, or [[jungle plants]].
* ''Lamb's Respite'' will affect {{tip|untargetable}} units but does not grant them the {{tip|heal}} at the end of the blessing.
* {{tip|Execute|Execution}} effects will bypass ''Lamb's Respite'' threshold and leave the unit at {{as|1 health}}. This does not occur if the unit ''is at the threshold'', as they are {{tip|invulnerable}}.
* {{tip|Health resource|Health costs}} will ignore ''Lamb's Respite's'' threshold.
** The cost will not be paid if the caster is below the threshold.
* ''Lamb's Respite'' has no effect on {{tip|zombie state}} units.
* The effects are applied before the cast time.
r1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  100 as 100 and riot's value 0,0,0 as 0
